trans-unit.source: Represents a step in a wizard control that can be customized through the use of templates.
The TemplatedWizardStep class is provided to enable developers to apply a template to the steps in a control that acts as a wizard.
The TemplatedWizardStep class is intended to be used primarily by control developers.
You can apply a theme to TemplatedWizardStep.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the template for displaying the content of a step in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that contains the template for displaying the content of a step in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
Gets the container that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control uses to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.ContentTemplate*> template for a step.
Although the syntax includes setting the ContentTemplateContainer property, it is for internal use only, so the property is effectively read-only.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.ContentTemplate*> template for a step.
Gets or sets the template for displaying the navigation user interface (UI) of a step in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that contains the template for displaying the navigation UI of a step in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.

Gets the container that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control uses to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*> template for a step.
Although the syntax includes setting the CustomNavigationTemplateContainer property, it is for internal use only, so the property is effectively read-only.
Your code should verify that the CustomNavigationTemplateContainer property is not `null` before referencing it.
This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*> template for a step.
If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*> has no content.
Gets or sets the skin to apply to the control.
The name of the skin to apply to the control.
The default is <xref:System.String>.
